title: Essential Elementor Widgets
description: Learn about the most important Elementor widgets and how to use them effectively.

blocks.content: Widgets are the building blocks of your Elementor pages. Understanding how to use them effectively is key to creating professional layouts.

Start with these fundamental widgets:

  • Heading: For titles and subtitles with typography controls
  • Text Editor: For paragraphs and formatted text
  • Image: For adding and styling images
  • Button: For calls-to-action
  • Video: For embedding videos from various sources

These widgets offer more complex functionality:

  • Form: Create contact and subscription forms
  • Gallery: Display image collections with various layouts
  • Carousel: Create sliding content sections
  • Tabs: Organize content in tabbed interfaces
  • Accordion: Create expandable content sections
